select ifnull(a.user_name,'')accepter,b.finish_time,GROUP_CONCAT(inspection_address SEPARATOR ',')inspection_address from ( select '质检部' as user_name FROM `user` where id=15 union all SELECT user_name FROM `user` where role_no=9 and job='质检' )a left join (
select CONCAT(ir.project_no,',','<font color=blue class="uncheck-ad ',if(g.check_number is null,'un-check-t','check-d'),'">',ir.inspection_address,'</font>',',','未完成检验') as inspection_address,ifnull(p.project_name,'')projectName,ir.description,ifnull(p.project_amount,'')projectAmount ,p.plant_analysis,ir.initiator,ir.accepter,ir.finish_time,pt.task_status,pt.operator_time,pt.new_date,ir.produce_status from inspection_reservation ir left join project p on ir.project_no=p.project_no LEFT JOIN project_task pt on ir.project_no_id=pt.project_no_id left join goods_entry g on g.check_number=ir.check_number and g.check_number!='' where ir.finish_time=#{start} and task_status=0
)b on a.user_name=b.accepter
group by a.user_name,b.finish_time
